column1: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Showers will occur at several places in the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to
Matara via Colombo and Galle. Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in the
other sea areas around the island during the afternoon or night.
Winds will be westerly to south-westerly and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.
